data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liang, Jun-Hui, Huang, Wei-Long, Ren, Dong (2012): Graciliblatta bella gen. et sp. n. — a rare carnivorous cockroach (Insecta, Blattida, Raphidiomimidae) from the Middle Jurassic sediments of Daohugou in Inner Mongolia, China. Zootaxa 3449: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214288
